headline: Kinder Morgan (KMI) Valuation Check After Recent Share Price Momentum
summary: Kinder Morgan stock triggered article Kinder Morgan (KMI) is back on investor radars after recent trading pushed the shares to a last close of $30.50, prompting a fresh look at its energy infrastructure footprint and earnings profile. See our latest analysis for Kinder Morgan. Beyond the latest move, Kinder Morgan’s 30 day share price return of 12.96% and 90 day share price return of 14.88% sit alongside a 1 year total shareholder return of 17.65% and a very large 5 year total shareholder...
